text: tame kahi do ke hum pote mara mate ko'i phayadano adhikara nathi rakhato ane na to ko'i nukasanano, parantu jetalum allaha'e icchayum hoya tetalum ja (mara mate che) ane jo mane adrsyanum jnana hota to, hum ghana phayada prapta kari leto, ane ko'i nukasana mane na thatum, hum to phakata cetavani apanara ane subhecchaka chum, te loko mate je'o imana rakhe che
